gdpr_modal.title: Processing of Personal Data (GDPR)
gdpr_modal.intro: In accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and related laws, we process your personal data to the extent necessary to provide our services.
gdpr_modal.section1_content: The controller of your personal data is Slapshot Club.
gdpr_modal.section2_content: We process your data (email, username) for the purpose of:
gdpr_modal.list_item1: Creating and managing your game account
gdpr_modal.list_item2: Ensuring application functionality and saving your progress
gdpr_modal.section3_content: We store your data for the duration of your account. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting your account.
gdpr_modal.footer: Detailed privacy policy can be found in the full version of the document.

Rules.title: Game Rules
Rules.description: Here you'll find everything you need to start collecting points.

rules_list.tip_before: Predictions are accepted until the start of the match. Then the match is locked.
rules_list.score_regular: Predictions are based on the final score (including overtime or shootout).
rules_list.exact_desc: If you guess the exact score, you get 5 points.
rules_list.diff_desc: If you guess the winner and the exact goal difference, you get 3 points.
rules_list.winner_desc: If you guess the winner but not the exact score or difference, you get 2 points.
rules_list.evaluation: Points are added to your account automatically after official evaluation.

Rules.no_competitions: There are currently no active competitions with custom scoring.

MiniLeagueRules.capacity_description: Players always create <r>private</r> mini leagues. League capacity is not fixed, but <r>dynamic</r>.
MiniLeagueRules.capacity_rule_pro: <r>Pro</r> member increases capacity by <r>5 spots</r> (1 for themselves + 4 Free).
MiniLeagueRules.capacity_rule_vip: <r>VIP</r> member increases capacity by <r>10 spots</r> (1 for themselves + 9 Free).
MiniLeagueRules.capacity_hint: The more paying players you have in the league, the larger the capacity for others.
MiniLeagueRules.owner_right_invite_desc: Only the owner can see the invitation code.
MiniLeagueRules.owner_right_approval_desc: Owner must approve every new member (Waiting List).
MiniLeagueRules.owner_right_management_desc: Can kick members or delete the league.
MiniLeagueRules.owner_right_transfer_desc: Can transfer the "captain's armband" to another member.
